timeline.author: adrianfish

timeline.body: This is an anti pattern. You should never need to do this as Locale.getDefault picks up the settings from the JVM.
timeline.bodyText: This is an anti pattern. You should never need to do this as Locale.getDefault picks up the settings from the JVM.
timeline.bodyHTML: This is an anti pattern. You should never need to do this as Locale.getDefault picks up the settings from the JVM.
timeline.author: adrianfish

replies.bodyText: or even more so get it from the PreferencesService
replies.author: ern

timeline.author: adrianfish

timeline.bodyHTML:
I'm pretty sure you can just replace all this with ResourceLoaderMessageSource.

@bean
public MessageSource messageSource() {
ResourceLoaderMessageSource messages = new ResourceLoaderMessageSource();
messages.setBasename("Messages");
return messages;
}

Take a look at:
site/sakai-message-bundle-manager-tool/src/main/java/org/sakaiproject/mbm/ThymeleafConfig.java
timeline.author: adrianfish
